a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cumulative case fatality rate of the COVID-19 pandemic
The cumulative case fatality rate is the ratio between total confirmed deaths and total confirmed cases.
During an evolving pandemic, the cumulative CFR is a poor measure of the mortality risk of the disease.
Note: Only countries with more than 100 confirmed cases are included.
